titleStmt.title: The Lord of Hosts: or, God guarding the camp of the saints, and the beloved city. Revel. 20.9. Wherein is declared, that God is now rising as a man of warr in the saints, by whom he will destroy all the oppressors and oppressions of men; with salvation and settlement to the kingdomes of the earth. / By William Erbery.
Armies defence
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.

titleStmt.title: The Lord of Hosts: or, God guarding the camp of the saints, and the beloved city. Revel. 20.9. Wherein is declared, that God is now rising as a man of warr in the saints, by whom he will destroy all the oppressors and oppressions of men; with salvation and settlement to the kingdomes of the earth. / By William Erbery.
Armies defence
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for Giles Calvert at the sign of the black spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: The last three pages are numbered 22, 25, 26.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of: The Armies defence.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
